abstract: Economic reports, corporate earnings and hearings this week in Washington.
snippet: Economic reports, corporate earnings and hearings this week in Washington.
lead_paragraph: ECONOMIC REPORTS Data will include consumer credit for April (Monday); wholesale trade inventories for April and the beige book (Wednesday); the trade balance for April (Thursday); retail sales for May, business inventories for April and the University of Michigan consumer confidence index for June (Friday).

headline.main: Looking Ahead to Economic Reports This Week

abstract: Steven P. Jobs unveiled a new iPhone with better battery life and a crisper display. Here’s our recap of the event.
snippet: Steven P. Jobs unveiled a new iPhone with better battery life and a crisper display. Here’s our recap of the event.
lead_paragraph: Steven P. Jobs, the chief executive of Apple, took the stage on Monday for a keynote at Apple’s annual Worldwide Developers Conference, held at the Moscone West convention center in San Francisco. As expected, he introduced a new phone, the iPhone 4, and shared news about apps on the iPad and iPhone.

headline.main: Apple Shows Off New iPhone With Better Display

abstract: Tree Top apple juice returns to consumer marketing by pulling out the stops, digitally speaking.
snippet: Tree Top apple juice returns to consumer marketing by pulling out the stops, digitally speaking.
lead_paragraph: Want to know a juicy marketing secret? As soft drinks contend with challenges like health concerns and the economy, juices are stepping up their advertising efforts.

headline.main: Sit Under the Apple Tree With Me, Juice Brand Asks
headline.print_headline: Sit Under the Apple Tree With Me, Juice Brand Asks

abstract: The new iPhone 4 will be available June 24 and is priced at $199 for the 16-gigabyte version and $299 for the 32-gigabyte version.
snippet: The new iPhone 4 will be available June 24 and is priced at $199 for the 16-gigabyte version and $299 for the 32-gigabyte version.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Seeking to fend off intensifying competition from Google and others in the smartphone business, Apple introduced a new version of the iPhone on Monday that includes a front-facing camera for video chats.

headline.print_headline: New iPhone 4 Adds a Camera for Video Chats

byline.original: By Miguel Helft and Jenna Wortham

abstract: Unilever, the giant consumer products marketer, told reporters on Monday afternoon that it would be the “consumer goods presenting advertiser” on the iAd platform. Among other marketers to clamber aboard the iAd band wagon, according to announcements at the Apple Worldwide Developers Conference on Monday, are AT&T, Best Buy, Walt Disney and Target.
snippet: Unilever, the giant consumer products marketer, told reporters on Monday afternoon that it would be the “consumer goods presenting advertiser” on the iAd platform. Among other marketers to clamber aboard the iAd band wagon, according to announceme...
lead_paragraph: How eager are advertisers to get behind the iAd mobile advertising platform being introduced by Apple? Some are sending news releases to herald their participation.
